View Javadoc
1   package com.ulflander.mining.nlp;
2   
3   import com.ulflander.app.model.Sentence;
4   import com.ulflander.app.model.Token;
5   
6   import java.util.Scanner;
7   
8   /**
9    * Performs basic tokenization using Java Scanner class.
10   *
11   * Created by Ulflander on 4/16/14.
12   */
13  public class BasicTokenizer extends Tokenizer {
14  
15      @Override
16      public final void tokenize(final Sentence sentence) {
17  
18          Scanner tokenize = new Scanner(sentence.getSurface());
19          Token prev = null;
20          int total = 0;
21  
22          while (tokenize.hasNext()) {
23              Token t = new Token(tokenize.next());
24              sentence.appendToken(t);
25  
26              if (prev != null) {
27                  prev.setNext(t);
28                  t.setPrevious(prev);
29              }
30  
31              prev = t;
32              total += 1;
33          }
34      }
35  }
